author: Francois-Serge
title: What a disaster
text:
The hotel had something like 300 young Italian teenagers staying there. Party and music all night in the rooms and corridors, use of illicit substances and alcohol despite being underage, sexual acts in public space, etc. I was unable to sleep the first two nights, and moved at another hotel (Mandarin Oriental) after that. Front desk did not care at all, the doorman apologized and agreed that "it is really a mess". I complained, got an email back saying that "we consistently strive to achieve high standards of service and regret we failed to meet your expectations on this particular occasion". What a joke!
